lead_paragraph: It was not budget cuts or a contentious relationship with faculty that led to the resignation of Lisa S. Coico, but her use of college funds for personal matters.

headline.print_headline: A Divisive College President, and a Long List of Expenses
headline.main: A Divisive President at City College, and a Long List of Personal Expenses

snippet: It was not budget cuts or a contentious relationship with faculty that led to the resignation of Lisa S. Coico, but her use of college funds for personal matters....
abstract: City College of New York president Lisa S Coico, who has abruptly resigned, was apparently compelled to leave over her use of college funds for personal matters; school is in disarray as federal investigation of her activities expands, with staff and faculty ruminating over whether other parts of City University of New York will be targeted.
